caption: Metric
description: The Metric object defines a simple name/value pair entity for a metric.
name: metric

metric_type.description: The metric type, as defined by the metric_type_id.

metric_type_id.description: Metric type represent specific type of metric asociated with a metric value as defined by defined by the types in https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/general/trace/.
